seo.title: Car Service in Yerevan - Car Repair and Maintenance
seo.description: Full range of car repair and maintenance services in Yerevan. Quality service, experienced mechanics, work guarantee.
seo.keywords: car service yerevan, car repair yerevan, car maintenance, car diagnostics, body repair, auto electrician
seo.ogTitle: Automir Car Service in Yerevan - Professional Car Repair
seo.ogDescription: We offer quality repair and maintenance for cars and trucks. Book online!

text.hero_item2_text: warranty on all types of work
text.benefits_title: Repair and maintenance of cars of any complexity
text.benefit_item1_desc: Our craftsmen are highly qualified specialists with many years of experience
text.benefit_item2_desc: For every job done in our service, the client receives a full warranty
text.benefit_item3_desc: We build the entire process from car reception to delivery considering the client's wishes
text.benefit_item4_desc: The experience of our craftsmen helps to complete repairs and diagnostics in the shortest possible time
text.benefit_item5_desc: A variety of promotions, discounts, and special offers for car service clients
text.benefit_item6_desc: A comfortable waiting area helps our clients to distract from all problems
text.ram_point1_text: we will make a competent and high-quality car selection
text.ram_point2_text: we will deliver the car and restore it turnkey
text.electric_item4_title: all types of car electrical work
text.howitworks_desc: We value our clients' time and therefore have simplified the entire repair process from application to car retrieval as much as possible
text.step_item1_desc: Leave a request for a consultation by phone or through the feedback form on our website
text.step_item2_desc: Our specialist will contact you to clarify details, advise on the availability of spare parts and repair costs
text.step_item3_desc: We will book you in at a comfortable and convenient time for you
text.step_item4_desc: Upon arrival at the service, you receive a free chassis diagnostics and a proposal with a list of spare parts and works
text.step_item5_desc: Within the agreed terms, your car undergoes repair or maintenance with a quality guarantee
text.step_item6_desc: You come at a convenient time for you to pick up the repaired car
text.brands_desc_l1: Automir car service offers quality repair and diagnostics of cars in Yerevan at reasonable prices.
text.brands_desc_l2: We professionally repair cars of any make and any year of manufacture
